sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均含"文件"之意。
means: paper ： 普通用词，泛指成册供将来参考或使用的任何文件或公文等。
document ： 即可指法律性文件，也可指用作证明或消息来源的文件或记录等。

sentence.Network_en: To close your document, press CTRL+W on your keyboard.
sentence.Network_cn: 关闭文件时要同时按键盘上的CTRL键和W键。

sentence.Network_en: I invite every citizen to carefully study the document.
sentence.Network_cn: 我请每位市民都仔细研读该文件。

sentence.Network_en: The document was previously circulated in New York at the United Nations.
sentence.Network_cn: 这份文件先前在纽约的联合国总部传阅过.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 文档（document）节点的 nodeName 永远是 #documentnodeType 属性可返回节点元素的类型。
全球汽配OE资讯网，汽配出口推广专家 ... 8. 市场( Market) 9. 文件( Document) 1. 商品检验( Commodity Inspection).
文字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 文物〖 culturalrelic;culturaltreasures〗 文献〖 document;literature〗 文秀〖 gentleandpretty〗.
帖字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 典押〖 mortgage〗 官府文书,公文〖 document〗 证券;单据;凭证〖 security〗.

list.abs: 海运常用英文词汇缩写 - 天狼2008 ... 装运单||载货单 shipping invoice 装运单据 shipping documents 大副收据 mate's receipt.
the relevant certificate of academic documents ;, 相关学历证书证件;
实用海洋平台英语 - 豆丁网 ... document approval and issue 文件的批准和下发 documentation 文件编制 dog 组装用的刀把.
文字图标免费下载, Text图标, PNG ICO, 图标之家 ... 网络图标( Network Icon) 文件图标( Document Icon) 目的图标( AIM Icon).

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, from Latin documentum 'lesson, proof' (in medieval Latin 'written instruction, official paper'), from docere 'teach'

entry.def: A document is one or more official pieces of paper with writing on them.

example.ex: The foreign ministers of the two countries signed the documents today.
example.tran: 两国的外交大臣今天签署了文件。

example.ex: ...a policy document for the Labour Party conference...
example.tran: 为工党大会准备的政策文件

entry.def: A document is a piece of text or graphics, for example a letter, that is stored as a file on a computer and that you can access in order to read it or change it.

example.ex: When you are finished typing, remember to save your document.
example.tran: 完成录入后，记得将文档存盘。

entry.def: If you document something, you make a detailed record of it in writing or on film or tape.

example.ex: He wrote a book documenting his prison experiences...
example.tran: 他写书详细记录了他的狱中经历。

example.ex: The effects of smoking have been well documented.
example.tran: 有关吸烟的影响记录翔实。

means.word_mean: 1. writing that provides information (especially information of an official nature)
2. anything serving as a representation of a person's thinking by means of symbolic marks
3. a written account of ownership or obligation
4. (computer science) a computer file that contains text (and possibly formatting instructions) using 7-bit ASCII characters

sentences.sentence: "The parents documented every step of their child's development"

auth_sentence.content: Perfectly proper that that document should not be published.
auth_sentence.res_content: Perfectly proper that that document should not be published.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Perfectly proper that that document should not be published.

auth_sentence.content: We treat this document with suspicion, Garawa said.
auth_sentence.res_content: We treat this document with suspicion, Garawa said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We treat this document with suspicion, Garawa said.

auth_sentence.content: I have not received any document to that affect.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have not received any document to that affect.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have not received any document to that affect.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 驯服的,易控制的,容易教的

stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+docile[adj.驯服的,易控制的,容易教的]→不可教的
docu=doc教+ment具体物→用来教的东西→文件

Sentence.sentence: The authors documented an annual drop of as many as 120,000 cases of heart disease, 66,000 instances of stroke and 99,000 heart attacks caused by high blood pressure after a 3-g-per-day reduction in salt.
Fetch the documents signed by Mr Gartner.
Go upstairs to sign some document.
Educators may fear that children hearing two languages will become permanently confused and thus their language development will be delayed ;this concern is not documented in the literature.

means.word_mean: 用纪实材料构成(小说、电影、电视等)；(用电影、电视、报纸、文学等形式)作记述性报道，纪实性地描述

sentences.en: He documented the destruction he observed during the Cosovo War.
sentences.cn: 根据他在科索沃战争期间的观察，他对破坏情况作了记述性报道。

means.word_mean: 为书(或文章等)引证或提供引证(材料)，为(书、小册子等)提供参考书(或注明资料来源)

sentences.en: The life of Marx is remarkably well documented.
sentences.cn: 马克思的生平有极翔实可靠的文献作证。

means.word_mean: 用文件(或文献、证书、证件等)证明，用参考资料证明(或证实)；提供文献(或文件、证据等)

sentences.en: He can document his theory with facts.
sentences.cn: 他能为自己的理论提供事实证明。

jushi.english: It's a weak document, not anywhere good enough.
jushi.chinese: 这是一个没有多大约束力的文件,根本没有用。

jushi.english: After a long discussion the delegates agreed on the final document.
jushi.chinese: 经过长时间讨论,代表们一致通过了最后文件。

jushi.english: The films document the development of the railways.
jushi.chinese: 这些电影记录了铁路的发展。
